name: I can't believe it's not Celeste 2: Lani's Trek
name_original: I can't believe it's not Celeste 2: Lani's Trek
description:
Nguyen, Matthew Todd, Graham Tao, Rachel

https://github.com/gdrtodd/Game-Level-Design-Prototype

ActionButtonMatt's own weirdo controlsMovement / AimCursor keysESDFJumpSpaceKDashShiftJGrapple (!)ZL

It has walljumping and airdashing just like Celeste.

It has a grapple hook just like Celeste 2: Lani's Trek.

Unlike Celeste 2: Lani's Trek you can't grapple onto any surface. Only orange rail-y surfaces.
